name: DTU Earthbound
description:
Earthbound is a climate tech catalyst that nurtures deep tech science, matches scientists with proven entrepreneurs, and hatches early startups that fight climate change.

Launched in the fall of 2023, Earthbound offers fellowships for scientists behind deep tech inventions, proven impact entrepreneurs and students who wish to work in climate tech.

Embedded into DTU (Technical University of Denmark) as part of their ecosystem, Earthbound is given unprecedented access to deep tech science at the time of invention.
slogan: A catalyst transforming deep tech science into early startups that fight climate change.
